trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle de servidor Web <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control renders a button that automatically checks the authentication status of the user and displays the appropriate login or logout option.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle apresenta um botão que automaticamente verifica o status de autenticação do usuário e exibe a opção apropriada de logon ou logoff.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> classe fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> to generate the design-time markup, since the user authentication status is not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design, porque o status de autenticação de usuário não está disponível em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência dos controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyLoginStatus` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyLoginStatus` controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.

trans-unit.source: The `MyLoginStatus` is a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: O `MyLoginStatus` é uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyLoginStatusDesigner` class from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>, and then applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute for the `MyLoginStatusDesigner` on the `MyLoginStatus` control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyLoginStatusDesigner` classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner>e, em seguida, aplica um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> de atributo para o `MyLoginStatusDesigner` no `MyLoginStatus` controle.

trans-unit.source: The `MyLoginStatusDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to draw a blue, dashed border around the control to make it more visible, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the `MyLoginStatus` is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value.
trans-unit.target: O `MyLoginStatusDesigner` substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para desenhar uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para torná-lo mais visível, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade o `MyLoginStatus` é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção da lista de ação de designer para esse designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class, adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is obtained from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> base property, and then returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> classe, adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> que é obtido o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade base e, em seguida, retorna o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação usada para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property (depending on whether the user is logged in), is `null`, an empty string (""), or a single space (" "), the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> property, as appropriate, to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property, enclosed in brackets ("[ ]").
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> (dependendo se o usuário estiver conectado), a propriedade é `null`, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), ou um único espaço (""), o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> propriedade, conforme apropriado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> propriedade, entre colchetes ("[]").

trans-unit.source: Then, regardless of the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, independentemente da configuração do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoginText%2A> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LogoutText%2A>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> chamadas de método a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base do método para gerar a marcação para o processamento de tempo de design do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> classe em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example draws a blue, dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the control is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo desenha uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para tornar sua extensão mais visível, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> é de propriedade do controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> método, certifique-se de chamar o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> método base porque eventualmente, por meio de várias substitui níveis, chama o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> controle ou uma cópia do controle para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" />, que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: O visual designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.Initialize%2A> e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e os eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado ao designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade é sempre `true`, o designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propriedade retorna uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property creates the copy by persisting the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control, then parsing the persisted control string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> propriedade cria a cópia, persistindo real <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> controle, em seguida, analisar a cadeia de caracteres de controle persistente.

trans-unit.source: The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.
trans-unit.target: O controle copiado não afeta qualquer persistência para real <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações em tempo de design para o controle será mantido para a origem de marcação da página.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="false" /> ou para determinar seu valor com base em se o controle está marcado com um nível de classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> atributo.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginStatusDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> não for substituído, o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus" /> ignora o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
